summary: Natives of Northern Cyrodiil, they proved to be shrewd diplomats, honorable warriors, and study restoration magic.  They use the Voice of the Civilized to calm the enemy at the same time absorbing magic, and resist cold and poison due to the environment of their origins the Jerall Mountains.
descriptionHtml:
Origin: Northern Cyrodiil
City: Bruma
Location: Jerall Mountians
Population: Unknown
Race Background: Cyrodilic Nords, Breton, and Imperials procreated and populated this City. Due to the number of Races mixing; a NEW RACE was named:

__________________________[size=15][color=white][u]Brumagneian[/size][/color][/u]______________
__________________________Bru*main*nee*an (pronunciation)__________________________________

**NOTE:**
This is my first playable race, feedback is welcomed as a post or as a private message(e-mail). If you enjoy this Race Mod please Endorse it! Thank you.

Stats:
Health = 80  Magicka = 100  Stamina = 100

[u][color=aqua]Racial Power:[/u][/color]
[color=aqua][u]Voice of the Civilized[/color][/u]- Shout that will calm the enemy and also provide you with Dragonskin to absorb all magic.
[color=Red][u]Racial Ability:[/color][/u]
[color=Red][u]Brumagneian Blood[/color][/u]- Increases your resistance to Frost, and Poison. You also have the luck of the Imperials.

[u][color=Teal]Skills:[/u][/color]
- Heavy Armor   - Block   - 1-Handed   2-Handed
- Restoration    - Speech   - Smithing

Troubleshooting: **Readme**Important**
- If you are using [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17802//?]Climates of Tamriel[/url] besure to put this Race mod above CoT in the load order, or it will not show up in the Racemenu.

[color=lime][u]Other Mods I have Created:[/color][/u]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28464/?]Angelic_RangerBow[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29569/?]Personal Merchant[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29778/?]The Slayer Bow[/url]


[color=lime][u]Bugs Identified:[/color][/u]

8-August: Unable to change hair style using console \"showracemenu\" 

[color=Fuchsia][u]Updates[/color][/u]
TBD
author: Areis3020
